name: NSSharingServicePickerDelegate
desc: A set of methods that you use to customize the service picker behavior.

items.name: func sharingServicePicker(NSSharingServicePicker, sharingServicesForItems: [Any], proposedSharingServices: [NSSharingService]) -> [NSSharingService]
items.desc: Invoked to allow the delegate to customize exactly what appears in the sharing service picker before it is presented.

items.name: func sharingServicePicker(NSSharingServicePicker, delegateFor: NSSharingService) -> NSSharingServiceDelegate?
items.desc: Invoked to provide the delegate to the sharing service when the user has selected a service.

items.name: func sharingServicePicker(NSSharingServicePicker, didChoose: NSSharingService?)
items.desc: Invoked when the user has selected a service and before it is executed.
